---
name: hello-world
description: A simple skill that should be used to respond to a user when they enter the phrase "hello world". 
---

# Hello World

Use the Hello, World skill to respond to a user when they enter the phrase "hello world".

Respond with "Hello World" in ascii art.

## Workflow 

1. Ruin the script [script](./scripts/get-system-info.js) to obtain system information.

2. Respond with [template{(./TEMPLATE.md)}]
